dict.acceptation: 比（用于比较级）；宁愿…而不愿；除…以外；一…就；

sent.orig: The purchasing-power-rather-than-need argument, in fact, holds as long as anything for beef whatever.
sent.trans: 事实上，只要牛肉还需要拿钱去买，这种“由购买力而非需要决定”(purchasing-power-rather-than-need)观点总是适用的。

sent.orig: Rather than love, than money, than faith, than famen, than fairness, give me the truth.
sent.trans: 不要爱情，不要金钱，不要信仰，不要名誉，不要公平，只求给我真实。

sent.orig: Rather than love, than money, than faith, than fame, than fairness. Give me the truth.
sent.trans: 不要爱情，不要金钱，不要信仰，不要名誉，不要公平，只求给我事实！

sent.orig: Rather than love, than money, than faith, than fame, than fairness. give me truth.
sent.trans: 我宁可不要爱情、金钱、信仰、名誉、公平，也要事实的真相。

sent.orig: Rather than love, than money, than faith, than fame, than fairness.
sent.trans: 不是爱情，不是金钱，不是信仰，不是名誉，不是公平。
